name: CryptoHashConfig
title: Google
Privacy
Dlp
V2
CryptoHashConfig
description: Pseudonymization method that generates surrogates via cryptographic hashing. Uses SHA-256. The key size must be either 32 or 64 bytes. Outputs a 32 byte digest as an uppercase hex string (for example, 41D1567F7F99F1DC2A5FAB886DEE5BEE). Currently, only string and integer values can be hashed.

returns.description: The key used by the hash function.
The key used by the hash function.
